casebody.data:
177 A.3d 128 JAMES MONTAG, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. BOROUGH OF HO-HO-KUS, STEVEN SHELL, INDIVIDUALLY AND IN HIS OFFICIAL CAPACITY AS COUNCILMAN FOR THE BOROUGH OF HO-HO-KUS, DEFENDANTS-PETITIONERS.

CM37 September Term 2017

080057 December 13, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005315-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

*558It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
